queries.name: Popular nouns
queries.description: Popular nouns modified by the given adjective. For example; gradual → increase

queries.name: Popular adjectives
queries.description: Popular adjectives modified by the given noun. For example; beach → sandy

queries.name: Synonyms
queries.description: Words with the same meaning

queries.name: Antonyms
queries.description: Words with the opposite meaning

queries.name: "Triggers"
queries.description: Words that are likely associated within the same piece of text; cow → milking

queries.name: "Kind of"
queries.description: Hypernyms, categories with broader meaning than the search term; gondola → boat

queries.name: "More general than"
queries.description: Hypernym, words that fall withing a searched category; boat → gondola

queries.name: "Comprises"
queries.description: Holonym, words that comprise the searched term; car → accelerator

queries.name: "Part of"
queries.description: Holonym, words that the searched term comprises; accelerator → car

queries.name: Frequent followers
queries.description: Words that frequently follow searched term; wreak → havoc

queries.name: Frequent predecessors
queries.description: Words that frequently precede searched term; havoc → wreak

queries.name: Rhyming
queries.description: Words that rhyme

queries.name: Approximate rhymes
queries.description: Words that approximately rhyme; forest → chorus

queries.name: Sounds like
queries.description: Sound alike words; course → coarse

queries.name: Consonant match
queries.description: Words with matching consonants; sample → simple

queries.name: Similar meaning
queries.description: Words with similar meaning

queries.name: Topics
queries.description: Words describing similar topics

queries.name: Sounds like
queries.description: Words that are pronounced similarly

queries.name: Spelled like
queries.description: Words that are spelled similarly

queries.name: Left context
queries.description: Words words that immidiately precede

queries.name: Right context
queries.description: Words words that immidiately follow
